ctu_text:
The applicant must be from Scheduled Caste (ST), Other Backward Class (OBC), or Minority Community (as defined by the Government of India).
> **Ranking / Preference / Priority**
1. **Economic Ranking:** A merit list shall be prepared in order of increasing family income. Where family income is the same between two applicant students, the student belonging to a family with a larger number of family members will be given a higher ranking.
